modules.description: Performs equality checks and comparisons between arbitrary-precision integers. Converts between standard integer types, floating points, and strings, and vice versa. Enables precise arithmetic handling by wrapping Big_int.big_int values.

Processes and compares S-expression data structures, supporting equality checks and formatted output. Works with nested lists and atomic values represented as a unified type. Used to serialize and validate structured data in parser outputs and configuration files.

Parses Clarity smart contract code into an abstract syntax tree for analysis and transformation. Processes source code strings and token streams to extract structured contract data. Enables developers to inspect and manipulate contract logic during static analysis or compiler development.

Encapsulates arbitrary-precision integer operations, including equality, comparison, and type conversion, while managing S-expression parsing, comparison, and formatting for structured data. Supports big_int values and unified atomic or nested S-expression types. Performs precise arithmetic and validates serialized data formats. Can compare large integers, convert between string and numeric types, and check consistency of parsed configuration structures.
